events.name: Demand for raw materials needed for battery production

events.wd_description: Current trends in transport electrification and mobile technologies have created an increasing demand for raw materials needed for battery production.

events.name: ESG Systems
events.wd_description: Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) systems are increasingly important in the mining sector, driving the development of effective traceability systems.
events.description: Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) systems are increasingly important in the mining sector, driving the development of effective traceability systems.

events.name: ESG Initiatives
events.wd_description: Initiatives focusing on Environmental, Social, and Governance aspects within the mining industry.

events.wd_description: Frameworks developed to govern and guide ESG initiatives.

events.name: Mining Industry Traceability Systems
events.wd_description: Many mining companies are developing intercompany systems to trace raw materials as the demand for battery materials grows.
events.description: Many mining companies are developing intercompany systems to trace raw materials as the demand for battery materials grows.

events.name: Intercompany Systems
events.wd_description: Mining companies are developing intercompany systems to track raw materials within their processes, responding to the growing demand for battery materials.

events.name: Development Projects
events.wd_description: Various development projects are underway to enhance traceability systems within the mining industry.
